title: Handle a Total Loss Auto Claim
description: Following a severe accident, an adjuster has determined a customer's vehicle is a total loss.

tasks.description: Determine the Actual Cash Value (ACV) of the vehicle immediately before the loss.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster runs a valuation report and determines the vehicle's ACV.

tasks.description: Present the valuation and settlement offer to the policyholder.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster clearly explains the valuation and the total settlement amount to the customer.

tasks.description: Once the customer accepts, process the settlement payment and arrange for the salvage of the vehicle.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster issues the payment and coordinates with a salvage yard to pick up the vehicle.
